newsitem.title: USA: Structural Dynamics, IBM form vendor pact.
newsitem.headline: Structural Dynamics, IBM form vendor pact.

text.p: Structural Dynamics Research Corp said it was in a pact with International Business Machines Corp under which the two companies will provide industry leading solutions in both the UNIX and NT operating environments on a worldwide basis.
The companies will together deliver Structural Dynamics' I-DEAS Master Series(TM), I-DEAS Artisan Series(TM), and Metaphase Series 2 software products on IBM hardware platforms.
Also, as part of the relationship, the two companies will execute joint marketing activities to identify opportunities and satisfy demand in the marketplace for SDRC software on IBM platforms.
In addition to IBM, Structural Dynamics' software runs on most of the leading hardware platforms and SDRC has business relationships with several other hardware vendors.
